name: The Colonel
notes: Led assault on Tower. Previously Cafnet party Archivist. Builds little towers; keeps rabbits.

name: Fyncho
notes: Primary record-keeper. Dreams documented. Travels in Mirado region. Attempted token designation for captured women.

name: Skurla
notes: Colonel's daughter. Maintains map book. Surveillance operations.

name: Molgen
notes: Tower figure. Role unclear from intelligence.

name: Trex
notes: Tower figure. Role unclear from intelligence.

name: Turkel
notes: Tower figure. Role unclear from intelligence.

name: Borpo
notes: Desert forces commander. External alliance status unclear.

name: Bardem
notes: Stationed south of main force. Source of Colonel information.

name: Crishl
aliases: Crazy Shaved Lady / geometrical hair woman
notes: Woman with geometrical hair. Created by Ageless Inventor for retribution against Governor Baxter. Harnessed Yeller creature.
